title: Quiz 2 - Time and Distance
instruction: Directions (45-50): To answer the following questions, which of the information given in the Statements (A ), (B ), (C ) and (D ) or (1), (2), (3) and (4) below is/are necessary/ sufficient?

quiz.text: Two trains of equal length take 10 seconds and 15 seconds respectively to cross a telegraph post. If the length of each train be 120 meters, in what time (in seconds) will they cross each other travelling in same direction?
options: 16 s
15 s
12 s
60 s
None of these

quiz.text: A person travels 600 km by train at 80km/hr, 800 km by ship at 40 km/hr. 500 km by aero plane at 400 km/hr and 100 km by car at 50 km/hr. what is the average speed for the entire distance?
options: km./hr.
60 km./hr.
km./hr.
62 km./ hr.
None of these

quiz.text: One-third of a certain journey is covered at the rate of 25 km/hr, one-fourth at the rate of 30 km/hr and the rest at 50 km/hr. The average speed for the whole journey is
options: 35 km/hr
33(1/3) km/hr
30 km/hr
37(1/12)  km/hr
None of these

quiz.text: In covering certain distance, the speeds of A and B are in the ratio of 3 : 4. A takes 30 minutes more than B to reach the destination.  The time taken by A to reach the destination is :
options: 1 hour
1.5 hours
2 hours
2.5 hours
None of these

quiz.text: A car starts with the speed of 70 km/h with its speed increasing every two hours by 10 km/h. In how many hours will it cover 345 km?
options: 2.25 hours
4 hours
4.5 hours
3 hour
None of these

quiz.text: Aditya rides a cycle at the speed of 15 km/h but stops for 10 minute to take rest every 20 kms. How much time will he take to cover a distance of 150 kms?
options: 11 hours 10 minutes
11 hours
12 hours 30 minutes
15 hours
None of these

quiz.text: The ratio between the speed of bike and train is 15: 27 respectively. Also, a bus covers a distance of 720 km in 9 hours. The speed of the bike is three-fourths the speed of the bus how much distance will the train cover in 7 hours?
options: 756 km
760 km
740 km
720 km
None of these

quiz.text: A bus started its journey from Bettiah and reached Motihari in 44 minute with its average speed 50 km/h. If the average speed of bus is increased by 5 km/h how much time will it take to cover the same distance?
options: 31 min
36 min
38 min
40 min
None of these

quiz.text: A train can travel 50% faster than a bus. Both start from point A at the same time and reach point B at same time. Point B is 75 km away from point A on the way the train stopping 12.5 minutes. The speed of bus is:
options: 110 km/h
120 km/h
55 km/h
60 km/h
None of these

quiz.text: A train crosses a pole in 10 seconds and a platform, which is 40% longer than the length of train in 24 seconds. If the length of platform is 140 m, what is speed of the train?
options: 36 m/s
5 m/s
10 m/s
15 m/s
None of these

quiz.text: It takes eight hours for a 600 km journey if 120 km is done by train and rest by car. It takes 20 minutes more if 200 km is done by train and the rest by car. The ratio of the speed of the train to that of car is:
options: 2 : 3
3 : 2
4 : 3
3 : 4
None of these

quiz.text: Aditya is travelling on his cycle and has calculated to reach point A at 2 pm, if he travel at 10 km/h. He will reach there at 12 noon, if he travel at 15 km/h. At what speed must he travel to reach D at 1 pm?
options: 10 kmph
11 kmph
12 kmph
13 kmph
None of these

quiz.text: A train running at a speed of 40 m/s crosses a pole in 21 seconds less than the time it required to cross a bridge 3.5 times its length at the same speed. What is the length of the bridge?
options: 1080 m
240 m
840 m
560 m
None of these

quiz.text: Two trains A and B start at the same time from Delhi and Patna respectively towards each other they met after 16 hours. If the distance between Delhi and Patna is 1872 km and train B runs 27 km/h faster than train A what is the speed of train A?
options: 45 km/h
72 km/h
48 km/h
60 km/h
None of these

quiz.text: Two trains M and N cross a pole in 25 seconds and 1 min 15 seconds respectively. The length of train M is half the length of train N. What is the respective ratio between the speed of train M and train N?
options: 2 : 3
1 : 2
2 : 1
3 : 2
None of these

quiz.text: A truck cover a distance of 396 km in 5 hour 30 minutes. The average speed of bike is 4/3 of average speed of truck. What is the time taken by bike to cover distance of 12 km less than the distance which the truck cover?
options: 4 Hrs
3 Hrs
5 Hrs
4 hour 15 minutes
None of these

quiz.text: Train A starts its journey from Patna to Hazipur while train B starts from Hazipur to Patna. After crossing each other they finish their journey in 81 hours and 121 hours respectively. Then what will be speed of train B if train A speed is 44 km/h?
options: 44 Km/h
55 Km/h
36 Km/h
46 Km/h
None of these

quiz.text: Two train start at same time from Delhi and Mumbai and comes towards each other at the rate of 85 km and 65 km per hour respectively. When they meet it is found that one train has travelled 20 km more than the other. Find the distance between Delhi and Mumbai?
options: 140 Km
75 Km
150 Km
130 km
None of these

quiz.text: A train start from Delhi on Sunday at 9 am with speed of 25 km/h, another train starts from there on same day at 40 km/h at 3 pm in the same direction. Find at what distance from Delhi both train will meet?
options: 200 km
300 km
400 km
450 km
None of these

quiz.text: An airplane covers a certain distance at a speed of 240 km per hour in 5 hours. To cover the same distance in 1(2/3)hours, it must travel at a speed of:
options: 300 km./hr.
360 km./hr
600 km./hr
720 km./hr
None of these

quiz.text: Aditya covered a certain distance at some speed. Had he moved 3 km/h faster he would have taken 40 minute less. If he had moved 2 km/h slower he would have been taken 40 minutes more. The distance is:
options: 40
35
49
45
None of these

quiz.text: A bus take 15 hours to go from Delhi to Chandigarh. Bus go one-third time with speed of 80 km/h. 40%  of rest time with speed of 70 km/h. Two-third of rest of time with speed of 85 km/h rest with speed of 100 km/h. What is the distance that cover by bus?
options: 1200 km
860 km
1120 km
1220 km
None of these

quiz.text: In a race of one kilometer, A gives B a start of 100 metres and still wins by 20 seconds. But if A gives B a start of 25 seconds, B wins by 50 metres. The time taken by A to run one kilometer is:
options: 500/29 seconds
1200/29 seconds
800/29 seconds
700/29 seconds
None of these

quiz.text: A man covers a certain distance between his house and office on scooter. Having an average speed of 30 km/hr, he is late by 10 min. However, with a speed of 40 km/hr, he reaches his office 5 min earlier. Find the distance between his house and office.
options: 20 km
25 km
30 km
35 km
None of these

quiz.text: The distance between two stations, Delhi and Amritsar, is 450 km. A train starts at 4 p.m. from Delhi and moves towards Amritsar at an average speed of 60 km/hr. Another train starts from Amritsar at 3.20 p.m. and moves towards Delhi at an average speed of 80 km/hr. How far from Delhi will the two trains meet and at what time?
options: 5.30 p.m.
5.50 a.m.
6.50 p.m.
6.30 a.m.
None of these

quiz.text: A, B and C can walk at the rates of 3, 4 and 5 km per hour respectively. They starts from Pune at 1, 2, 3 oclock respectively. When B catches A, B sends him back with a message to C. When will C get the message?
options: 4.15 oclock
5.15 oclock
6.25 oclock
6 o'clock
None of these

quiz.text: Two trains start at the same time from two stations and proceed towards each other at the rates of 20 km and 25 km per hour respectively. When they meet, it is found that one train has travelled 80 km more than the other. Find the distance between the two stations.
options: 720 km
740 km
760 km
780 km
None of these

quiz.text: A goods train and a passenger train are running on parellel tracks in the same direction. The driver of the goods train observes that the passenger train coming from behind overtakes and crossed his train completely in 60 seconds. Whereas a passenger on the passenger train marks that he crossed the goods train in 40 seconds. If the speed of the train is in the ratio of 1: 2, find the ratio of their lengths.
options: 1 : 2
2 : 1
3 : 2
2 : 3
None of these

quiz.text: A train after travelling 50 km meets with an accident and then proceeds at three-fourth of its former speed and arrives at its destination 35 minutes late. Had the accident occurred 72 km further, it would have reached the destination only 15 minutes late. The normal speed of the train is
options: 36 km/hr.
38 km/hr.
46 km/hr.
72 km/hr.
None of these

quiz.text: Two trains measuring 100 m and 80 m respectively, run on parallel lines of track. When traveling in opposite directions they are observed to pass each other in 9 seconds, but when they are running in the same direction at the same rate as before, the faster train passed the other in 18 seconds. Find the speed of the two trains in km per hour.
options: 12 km/hr, 5 km/hr
14 km/hr, 18 km/hr
16 km/hr, 54 km/hr
18 km/hr, 54 km/hr
None of these

quiz.text: At 8 : 00 A.M. Aman started running from tree E. At 11:00 A.M. a lion, who was at tree E saw Aman and chased him. Aman was running away from the lion and after 10 min. he increased his speed by 100%. At what time will the lion catch Aman ? (speed of lion is 20 km/hr)
options: 12 : 30 pm
12 : 25 pm
01 : 00 pm
01 : 25 pm
None of these

quiz.text: Gaurav and Abhishek start at same time from tree B to tree D, after reaching tree D they turned to tree B. At approximately how much distance from tree B they meet 1st time?
options: 235 km
225 km
230 km
215 km
150 km

quiz.text: Nitesh covers a distance from point O to tree E, if he stops 30 min after reaching every tree. Find the total time to cover the distance by Niteesh?
options: 30 hrs
28 hrs
2 hrs
32 hrs
None of these

quiz.text: If Gaurav is standing at tree D and Shailesh is standing at tree F. In how  much time will they meet if they walk towards each other ?
options: 1 hr
hrs
hrs
2 hrs
3 hrs

quiz.text: Gaurav covers a distance from point O to tree C then he reduced his speed by 40% and further reach to point F. Find the average speed of Gaurav during his whole journey?
options: km/hr
km/hr
km/hr
km/hr
None of these

quiz.text: Average speed of the scooterist to cover first 110 km distance is what percent more/less than the average speed of the motorist to cover first 100 km distance ?
options: 5%
10%
15%
20%
None of these

quiz.text: If the speed of the scooterist and the motorist is increased by 20% and decrease by 20% respectively throughout the journey then find the difference in time taken by the scooterist and motorist to cover the given total distance ?
options: 25/24 hrs.
23/31 hrs.
31/29 hrs.
27/ 18 hrs.
Cant be determined

quiz.text: If the speed of the scooterist and the motorist is increased by 10% and 20% respectively throughout the journey then find the difference in time taken by the scooterist and motorist to cover the given total distance ?
options: hr
hr
hr
hr
None of these

quiz.text: At what time they will be 30 km apart from each other if they choose the same road to cover 120 km of distance ?
options: 10 : 20 am
11 : 15 am
11 : 09 am
10 : 00 am
None of these

quiz.text: The dog sees a stationary cat and estimates that it will catch the cat in 1 min and start moving toward it. At the same time cat also starts moving away from the dog. In how much time the dog will catch the cat?
options: 1 min.
2 min.
4 min.
min.
None of these

quiz.text: Jackal sees a Rabbit and finds that it is 2 minute away from him. Jackal starts to run towards Rabbit and at the same time rabbit also starts to run away from Jackal. In which minute Jackal will catch the Rabbit?
options: Jackal could not catch the rat
In 5th min
In 4th min.
In 6th min.
None

quiz.text: What is the ratio of the speed of Dog to Cheetah, if Cheetah covers 50% of more distance in one leap than lion and sum of leaps taken by Cat and Monkey in one minute is equal to the number of leaps taken by Cheetah in one minute?
options: 2 : 5
5 : 8
11 : 13
8 : 33
None

quiz.text: When a Cat climb up a tree its speed is reduced by 20% and when Monkey climb up a tree its speed is increased by 20%. Cats speed on climbing up a tree is what percent of speed of Monkey when it climbs the tree. (Approximately)
options: 30%
40%
50%
10%
15%

quiz.text: What is the sum of distance cover by jackal, cat and dog in 2 minutes if distance cover by Jackal in 1 minute is 10 meters?
options: 28 m
44 m
54 m
68 m
None

quiz.text: At what time will a train reach Lucknow from Patna? A. The train crosses another train of equal length of 200 m and running in opposite direction in 9 sec. B. The train leaves Patna at 11:15 am for Lucknow, which is at a distance of 567 km. C. The 97.50-m-long train crosses a signal pole in 5 sec.
options: Only A
B and C together
A and C together
All statements are required
Only B

quiz.text: A train crosses another train in 10 sec. Find out the lengths of the trains. A. Ratio between the lengths the of second and first train is 4 : 5. B. Ratio between the speed of first and second trains is 1 : 2. C. The speed of first train is 36 km/hr.
options: Only A and B together
Only B and C together
Only A and C together
Questions cant be answered even after using all the information
None of these

quiz.text: What is the distance between city P and city Q?  I. Two persons A and B started simultaneously from P to Q, with their speeds in the ratio 4 : 5. II. B reached P one hour earlier than A reached Q. III. The difference between speeds of A and B is 20 kmph.
options: I and III only
II and III only
I and II only
All I, II and III together
Data inadequate

quiz.text: What is the distance between P and Q? I. Car A reaches point Q from point P in 2 hours. II. Car B covers the distance between P and Q with a uniform speed of 20km/h. III. The ratio of speeds of car A and car B is 4:5.
options: Statement I and II together are sufficient.
Statement II and III together are sufficient.
All the statements together are sufficient.
All the statements together are not sufficient.
All the statements are sufficient individually.

quiz.text: Who is the fastest among Karun, Rohit and Parthiv? I. The ratio of their speeds is 3:4:2 respectively. II. Karun takes one hour less than Rohit to travel the same distance. III. Parthiv take 2 hours less than Rohit to travel the same distance.
options: Statement 1 and 2 together are sufficient.
Statement 1 or statements 2 and 3 together are sufficient.
All the statements together are sufficient.
All the statements together are not sufficient.
All the statements are sufficient individually.

quiz.text: What are the speeds of two trains? A. Two trains of lengths 100 m and 80 m respectively run on parallel tracks. B. When running in the same direction the faster train passes the slower one in 18 seconds. C. When running in opposite directions, they pass each other in 9 seconds.
options: A and C together
A and B together
A, B and C together
B and C together
Question cant be answered even after using all the information
